title: India’s AI momentum: Building talent, infrastructure and inclusive innovation for a Viksit Bharat
description: India is rapidly advancing its AI capabilities with significant investments in infrastructure and talent development. The nation is fostering AI growth through initiatives like the IndiaAI Mission and Centres of Excellence, aiming for inclusive development an…
content: India is rapidly positioning itself as a global leader in artificial intelligence (AI) transformation, driven by large-scale reskilling efforts and deeper enterprise tech integration. In Q1 of FY26, … [+4761 chars]
